meanings.definition: A person or thing that resolves something.
meanings.sent1: The resolver helped us find a solution to the problem.
meanings.sent2: I used a resolver to fix the broken toy.
meanings.sent3: The little resolver teddy bear always knows how to make everyone happy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a resolver, bringing peace to the room.
meanings.sent5: The resolver's magic wand made all the troubles disappear.

meanings.definition: A device or software program used to convert domain names into IP addresses.
meanings.sent1: The resolver on my computer quickly found the website I was looking for.
meanings.sent2: I rely on the resolver to connect me to the internet.
meanings.sent3: The resolver program worked like a charm, turning website names into numbers.
meanings.sent4: The resolver acted as a bridge between the website name and its location.
meanings.sent5: With the resolver, I can easily navigate the online world.

meanings.definition: A person who settles disputes or solves problems.
meanings.sent1: The resolver at the office always helps us reach agreements.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the best resolver in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The resolver referee made sure everyone played fair.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor was a true resolver in the heated argument.
meanings.sent5: The resolver's wisdom guided us to a peaceful resolution.
